org.apache.river.test.impl.norm

Class UseRenewalServiceLeaseRemoveTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.qa.harness.QATestEnvironment
      • org.apache.river.test.share.TestBase
        • org.apache.river.test.share.LeaseGrantTestBase
          • org.apache.river.test.share.LeaseUsesTestBase
            • org.apache.river.test.impl.norm.UseRenewalServiceLeaseRemoveTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Test, TestEnvironment

    public class UseRenewalServiceLeaseRemoveTest
extends LeaseUsesTestBase
    Tests that an Lease Renweal Service properly grants, renews, cancels, and/or expires leases. Test for set avaiable by removing leases from the set.

    • Method Detail

      • construct

        public Test construct(QAConfig sysConfig)
               throws Exception
        Description copied from class: QATestEnvironment
        This method is called by the MasterTest immediately before the run method is called. Override this method to implement test specific construct code. This method:
        • saves a reference to config
        • starts the class server identified by the serviceName "qaClassServer" if the config value named org.apache.river.qa.harness.runkitserver is true (the default)
        • starts the class server identified by the serviceName "jiniClassServer" if the config value named org.apache.river.qa.harness.runjiniserver is true (the default)

        In the majority of cases this method will be overridden. The first action taken by the method should be a call to super.construct(sysConfig).

        Specified by:
        construct in interface TestEnvironment
        Overrides:
        construct in class LeaseUsesTestBase
        Parameters:
        sysConfig - the test properties
        Returns:
        Test to run.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any failure occurs during construct

      • parse

        protected void parse()
              throws Exception
        Description copied from class: LeaseUsesTestBase
        Parse our args
        -cancel
        Makes the test run the cancel variation of the test where the lease is canceled before it expires.
        -renew int
        Renew the lease int times using the initial duration befor letting it expire or canceling it. Defaults to 0 (no renewals.)
        -cancel_slop int
        Allow for a leased resource to disappear up to int milliseconds after cancel is called. Provided for tests that don't directly test resource availability, most tests should not use this option. Defaults to 0.
        Overrides:
        parse in class LeaseUsesTestBase
        Throws:
        Exception
